com.facebook.react.uimanager

类 ReactAccessibilityDelegate

  • java.lang.Object
    • AccessibilityDelegateCompat
      • com.facebook.react.uimanager.ReactAccessibilityDelegate

  • public class ReactAccessibilityDelegate
extends AccessibilityDelegateCompat
    Utility class that handles the addition of a "role" for accessibility to either a View or AccessibilityNodeInfo.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static class  ReactAccessibilityDelegate.AccessibilityRole
      These roles are defined by Google's TalkBack screen reader, and this list should be kept up to date with their implementation.
